subject: Physics
question_text: Given below are two statements : Statement (I) : The first ionization energy of Pb is greater than that of Sn . Statement (II) : The first ionization energy of Ge is greater than that of Si .

options.text: (1) Statement I is false but Statement II is true
(2) Statement I is true but Statement II is false
(3) Both Statement I and Statement II are true
(4) Both Statement I and Statement II are false
